Class MapManager

java.lang.Object
com.kentwentyfour.project12.gameobjects.MapManager
public class MapManager extends Object
Allows managing the state of all objects in the visualised in game

      public int[] coordinatesToMatrix(double x, double y)
      Translates coordinates to indexes of cells in the matrix.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate
      y - the y-coordinate
      Returns:
      an array containing the indexes of the cell corresponding to the given coordinates, or null if the coordinates are outside the matrix bounds

    • matrixToCoordinates

      Translates indexes of cells in the matrix to coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-index of the cell
      y - the y-index of the cell
      Returns:
      an array containing the coordinates corresponding to the given cell indexes, or null if the indexes are outside the matrix bounds
